title: Various Views of the Banks of the Ohio River
subtitle: Vineyards below Cincinnati, Bellevue, Parkersburg, Patriot, etc.

source.publication: Picturesque America; or, The Land We Live In, A Delineation by Pen and Pencil of the Mountains, Rivers, Lakes with Illustrations on Steel and Wood by Eminent American Artists
source.type: Antique black and white engraved illustration

location.subject: Ohio River banks including areas near Cincinnati

viewpoint.description: Multiple views of Ohio River banks including vineyards below Cincinnati. At bottom right is the General Buell paddle steamer.

technical.condition: Very good overall antique condition with mild toning throughout

description: Antique black and white engraved illustration from William Cullen Bryant's classic 1872 work 'Picturesque America; or, The Land We Live In, A Delineation by Pen and Pencil of the Mountains, Rivers, Lakes with Illustrations on Steel and Wood by Eminent American Artists' showing various views of the banks of the Ohio River, including vineyards below Cincinnati, Bellevue, Parkersburg, Patriot, and other locations along the river valley.
